name: midos-mcp
description: Production-tested developer knowledge base with 46,000+ chunks, 200+ skills across 20+ stacks, and 68 MCP tools. EUREKA-validated patterns, semantic search with Gemini embeddings (670K vectors, 3072-d). Not raw docs — battle-tested patterns from real projects.
author: MidOS Research

tools.name: smart_search
tools.description: Unified search across 46,000+ knowledge chunks — auto-detects keyword, semantic, or hybrid mode

tools.name: hybrid_search
tools.description: Combined keyword + semantic search with reranking

tools.name: list_skills
tools.description: Browse 200+ production-tested skill packs across 20+ stacks

tools.name: get_skill
tools.description: Get a complete skill pack by name or stack

tools.name: get_eureka
tools.description: Access 383 EUREKA-validated discoveries with measured ROI

tools.name: get_truth
tools.description: 50 truth patch documents — verified fixes and corrections

tools.name: semantic_search
tools.description: Vector search via LanceDB + Gemini embeddings (670K vectors, 3072-d)

tools.name: agent_handshake
tools.description: Personalized agent onboarding per model + stack

tools.name: hive_status
tools.description: System health dashboard and live statistics
